name: flickr downloadr
body:
# flickr downloadr
===============
### Screenshot
![screenshot](http://farm8.staticflickr.com/7244/7169293968_37bb99ee7c_o.png)

A windows app that would download all (or selected) photos in their selected size along with the tags, titles and descriptions
tagline: A windows app that would download all (or selected) photos in their selected size along with the tags, titles and descriptions
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
